title: Mr Squiggle and friends Bandywallop
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), ABC Video, Julia Kalytis and Pam Verrall
brief_description: Mr Squiggle and all his favourite friends from Bandywallop join in the fun in three complete episodes. There’s Roxanne of course, Bill Steamshovel Gus the snail, Merv Wallop and his nephew, Wayne. Episodes include: “Hen Pen”, “Ten Lane Highway”, “Singing Salesman”. Rated: G
creator_credit_for_label: ABC-TV (Australia), ABC Video, Julia Kalytis and Pam Verrall
